name: Pacific Continental Realty
address: 114 W Magnolia St Ste 201 Bellingham, WA 98225

yelp_reviews.author: Danielle H.
yelp_reviews.review: Property manager is flippant and will not directly address issues let alone communicate properly when concern is expressed about issues. Consistently acts as though concerns are a waste of her time and energy and someone else's problem, even though she is the property manager and the issues need to be corrected or communicated by her. Very frustrated and childish behavior. I have never experienced such flippant or careless property management.
